8/23/07

10 Year Anniversary: RED ZOMBIE (1997)

[Image missing from archive: https://web.archive.org/web/20070913235542im_/http://cinemassacre.com/gallery/redz-4.jpg]

watch it!

My first zombie flick. Shot on VHS. Edited on two VCR’s. Kool-Aid blood. And I play the evil “zombie master”. This movie was never finished, but if you’re in the mood for an old school, no budget, backyard production, then take a look.
